nodes.text: The Nightsister Forced Labor Camp was a labor camp of the Nightsisters on the planet Dathomir. They sent slaves to this camp to work in their mines.
In 1 ABY, a slave escaped from the camp and made it to the Trade Outpost where he hoped to find someone that would help him free the other slaves.

The Nightsister Forced Labor Camp appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
